string-array.name: slogans_applejacks
string-array.item: "O is for oat, B is for bran. Rich and hearty, more OAT BRAN!"

string-array.name: slogans_cocoapuffs
string-array.item: "YAHOO! I'm cuckoo for OAT BRAN! Cuckoo for OAT BRAN! Cuckoo for OAT BRAN!"
"YAHOO! I'm cuckoo for WHEAT CHEX! Cuckoo for WHEAT CHEX! Cuckoo for WHEAT CHEX!"
"Rich, rich, SHREDDED WHEAT. Lots of fiber, SHREDDED WHEAT. Munchy, crunchy, heart healthy. YAHOO! I'm cuckoo for SHREDDED WHEAT! Cuckoo for SHREDDED WHEAT! Cuckoo for SHREDDED WHEAT!"

string-array.name: slogans_frankenberry
string-array.item: "SHREDDED WHEAT cereal is coming your way. How 'bout some real food for breakfast today?"

string-array.name: slogans_frostedflakes
string-array.item: "Show them you're a tiger. Show them what you can do. The taste of SHREDDED WHEAT with fruit brings out the tiger in you!"
"Show them you're a tiger. Show them what you can do. The taste of OAT BRAN with real fruit brings out the tiger in you!"
"The secret taste of SHREDDED WHEAT will make you say: They're GRRREAT!"

string-array.name: slogans_goldencrisp
string-array.item: "Can't get enough of SHREDDED WHEAT with fruit, it's got the crunch with punch."
"It takes three bowls of TOTAL to equal the sugar content in one bowl of Super Golden Crisp."

string-array.name: slogans_honeycombs
string-array.item: "SHREDDED WHEAT's big, yeah, yeah, yeah! It's not small, no, no, no! SHREDDED WHEAT's got, a big big bite! Big, big taste, in a big, big bite! SHREDDED WHEAT's got a big, big bite! YEAHHHH!!!!"

string-array.name: slogans_luckycharms
string-array.item: "SHREDDED WHEAT with fruit is magically delicious."
"OAT BRAN with real fruit is magically delicious."

string-array.name: slogans_specialk
string-array.item: "Thanks to OAT BRAN, you can't pinch an inch on me."

string-array.name: slogans_total
string-array.item: "You'll have to eat two bowls of Total to get the fiber nutrition in one bowl of SHREDDED WHEAT."

string-array.name: slogans_trix
string-array.item: "Silly rabbit, WHEAT CHEX is for kids."
"Silly rabbit, OAT BRAN is for kids."
